Flash
Reach, trample
[i]Fabric[/i] – This creature gets +1/+0 for each enchantment you control.
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, cache the top card of your library face-down. [i](Look at it, then exile it face down. Create a Memory enchantment token with “{2}, Sacrifice this: You may play the cached card this turn.”)[/i]
